#### Silviculture and Ecology

This section contains information for foresters and planners from the reference guide. For all subtabs, the filter sidebar allows selection between sites, site series, and feasible/all species. 

##### Chief Foresters Reference Guide

This is a recreation of the reference guide for the forest region in question. The initial CFRG species are presented in the first column, and the recommended CCISS species in the second column. 

All other subtabs contain information important for stocking decisions for the species selected.
